text:
Minor update released to everyone - the UI tweak mentioned above, and a new tip about the CMS for developers certification has been added.

The UI Tweak for the page editor I will come up with a way to separate it out from the UI Tweaks toggle later on. The feature is useful enough as is that I think most users will like it. Feature was suggested by <@U54TVT3C1>
interestingly it appears that UI tweak isnâ€™t showing in some situations. Will look into it. It does not negatively impact anyone the back link is still there.

:faceplam:  forgot to merge in the UI tweak change before publishing the update lol. Only the tip is live for now.

Will get the UI tweak update in tonight or tomorrow
